body.name: Doorbell Camera Wireless with Included Ring Chime, Smart Video Doorbell for Home Security, AI Human Detection, Two Way Audio, Cloud Storage, Night Vision, Battery Powered, 2.4G WiFi
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 29 mins
features: Protected Cloud Storage: With our secure AES-128 encrypted cloud storage, you can opt for a subscription (sold separately) for improved user experience. Plus, a 30-day free trial for continuous recording and sharing is on us!

Bonus Doorbell Chime: The package includes a handy doorbell chime that you can place in any area of your home - be it the dining room, kitchen, or patio - for immediate notifications. Pair several chimes to a single doorbell for an even more convenient setup.
AI-Driven Human Recognition: Our smart technology, powered by Artificial Intelligence, accurately identifies human movement, thereby ignoring irrelevant motion such as passing cars or swaying trees.
Advanced Night Vision: With the integration of six IR lights and a smart sensor, our doorbell camera ensures top-notch video recording even in poorly lit conditions, offering 24/7 security.
Real-Time 2-Way Communication: Engage in live, two-way conversations with visitors from any location.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bitepass Smart Wireless Video Doorbell Camera with Chime Included

Secure Cloud Storage Our AES-128 encrypted cloud storage offers an enhanced experience through an optional subscription (available separately). Smart Human Detection Thanks to AI-driven technology, our system detects human activity, disregarding inconsequential motions like moving cars or fluttering foliage. Two-Way Audio Engage in real-time dialogues with visitors, no matter where you are. Superior Night Vision With infrared lights paired with a smart sensor, our camera promises exceptional video quality, even in dim lighting, ensuring round-the-clock safety.

1080p Viewing Our doorbell camera offers 1080p image quality coupled with infrared night vision capabilities, ensuring you can monitor your home day and night. Group Sharing Share camera access with family members for simultaneous remote monitoring. Optimized 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Our camera is designed for 2.4GHz Wi-Fi connectivity (5GHz Wi-Fi not supported). Easily mount it anywhere using the included screws and wall anchors. All-Weather IP65 Design Featuring a robust IP65 rating, this doorbell is resilient to dust and moisture, performing consistently across diverse climatic conditions.

Can the doorbell camera handle connections to 5GHz Wi-Fi networks? This doorbell camera connects to 2.4GHz Wi-Fi only. Ensure you have two Wi-Fi networks, one for 2.4GHz and another for 5GHz, with different names for proper connection. Should I buy an SD card for this video doorbell? SD cards aren't needed for this doorbell camera. It saves to the cloud, and you can start with a free trial. Does the package contain an indoor chime? Yes, it offers a chime designed for indoors. Does the doorbell camera support viewing from a mobile phone remotely? Of course, the video is accessible for viewing via the Aiwit app. Is there any security measure like encryption for videos on the cloud? Certainly, your footage is under AES-128 encryption in our cloud storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love it. It works just like a ring, but costs less. You'll get 30 days free for saving videos and after that it's $29.99 for the yearly subscription, which I think is fair. The quality is great during the day and at night. The doorbell is loud and can be heard outside, inside, and on your phone. Sound quality is good as well. I already plan on purchasing another one to give as a gift for Christmas. You will have to take it down to charge it, but I've had mine for a month and a half now and haven't had to charge it since I received it. Installation was easy and the camera connected to the wifi very quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good camera!
reviews.reviewText: I really like this camera and think it's a great deal for the price. Installation was a breeze especially because I already had another camera that uses the same app so it was super easy to add this one. The picture quality is good and it picks up every little movement if you have the motion detection set to high. I also like that it came with the plug in chime so you can hear the doorbell inside the house and not just on your phone. This was a good investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this device. It was easy to set up and streams a nice video.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This doorbell is better than I thought! I would definitely recommend. It gives you alerts whenever anyone passes and the chime is really loud. Great doorbell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The quality is great
reviews.reviewText: First off the quality is 🔥at a very affordable price. I like how you can pay $30 for a yr subscription to go back and see the footage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good door bell cam
reviews.reviewText: Was vary easy to set up and have it working in less then 10 min.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the product and I have been using it for about 2 weeks. It is a good camera for the price I paid, the camera is clear, it picks up sound, the sound alert is loud enough for me to hear. I love that it’s send motion notifications. However, it records all day long even if it is off and it creates 1,000 videos, so if I need to check back I have to look through so many video clips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great doorbell for the low. No issues. Chime is pretty loud too
